ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 13 Jul 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:

> 15th measure bard and carried several gp and a bronze longsword. I then
> [...]
> quite a while since I visited Halas. She offered me 3.3pp for the sword.

3.333pp is the normal best price I get for bronze longswords.
I always have my dirk in my main inventory when traveling.
When I stop by a vendor, I check the price on the dirk. If it
is not 4.286pp, I know the merchant is not giving me the best
possible prices and I hit it with the Charisma song. If that
doesn't help, I find another merchant.

> die kind of feeling, but more of a prickling along the back of your neck you
> get when your 'Wolf' faction takes a hit. Next thing I know it did just
> that! Since when is there a faction of Wolves? Unnerved I walked around

I think ever since they fixed it so wolves and bears no longer
attack druids and rangers on sight. I would dearly love to
know how to raise my faction with wolf as I've always liked
wolves. :-)

> Happily trotted into Rivervale, ah the wonders of halfling
> civilization. Rolled up to my friend Twippie and showed him the sword.
> He's been kindly to me for almost as long as I can remember so he always
> gives me great prices. He took one look at the word and offered me 2.7pp.

Some merchants are just stingier than others and do not seem
to give you the best prices despite your faction. Others will
give you the best prices even if they are indifferent to you
(if you have sufficient charisma).

> to be beat. Thinking that gypsy needed more investigation I ran back into
> Kithicor to find her. Well, the house was there still, but of Elsbyth there
> was no sign.

Hmm, she's been there every time I've visited, but then I've
only visited 3 times.
